author: hwright
msg: Buffer overflow on ensuring a 0 byte string buffer
This bug aborts our client if the OS catches it (bad) or overwrites
arbitrary ram (worse). r35974 fixes the exact allocating behavior tested

author: hwright
msg: Actually do the merge of r35967 purported to have been done in r36004.

author: hwright
msg: Add support to build and use SQLite amalgamation version on Windows.
This change implements the same behavior as *nix build system does.
